name: v0.12.9
body:
BR-rerank
* Writes predictions and confidence scores to file
* Allows users to specify max GB training iteration

name: v0.12.8
body: Make pyramid compatible with Java 9+

name: v0.12.7
body: Fix tar long file issue

name: v0.12.6
body:
New functions:
* Add the ability to normalize the feature matrix when creating datasets
* Add new calibrator type: identity (using uncalibrated confidence as final confidence) and zero (mapping everything to 0 confidence to avoid automation)
* Support F1 as calibration target
* Report Average Precision for each label classifier
* Unify LR and GB top feature file format

Internals:
* Use expected precision, recall, F1 as features for reranker calibrator
* Sample random support sets as negative calibration candidates
* Better bounds for isotonic regression output
* Improved CBM prediction stop condition based on the Threshold Algorithm

name: v0.12.5
body: release code and data for the ECML-PKDD 2019 paper "Learning to Calibrate and Rerank Multi-label Predictions"

name: v0.12.4
body:
* smoothed isotonic regression label calibrator
* use un-interpolated isotonic regression for label calibrator and interpolated isotonic regression for ensemble set calibrator
* make support predictions consistent with top_sets.csv

name: v0.12.3
body: Fixed an issue with the top sets

name: v0.12.2
body: Fix a bug in CombSUM ensemble caused by empty set

name: v0.12.1
body: Use F1 based confidence in CombSUM ensemble

name: v0.12.0
body:
* add precision, recall, F1, and ground truth to reports
* support F1 as the target metric in confidence threshold tuning
* average-confidence based ensemble
* isotonic regression outputs interpolated confidence

name: v0.11.4
body: New reranker implementation with sigmoid, weak monotonicity, and KL pre-training

name: v0.11.3
body: Allow users to set minimum and maximum predicted set sizes

name: v0.11.2
body: Add an option to disallow empty predictions

name: v0.11.1
body: Fix an out-of-memory issue

name: v0.11.0
body:
* App3 is renamed to AppBRGB
* AppBRGB and AppBRLR use similar properties files and output structures
* Make it easier for different classifiers to share input data
* Split data into train/validation/calibration/test 
* Add CTAT tuning and reporting
* Add reranker calibrator and prediction
* Support additional features in calibrator
* Support instance weights in classifier training

name: v0.10.3
body: Fix the null pointer exception bug in gradient boosting training

name: v0.10.2
body:
App3:
reduce label calibration memory usage

name: v0.10.1
body:
App3:
cardinality based calibration

name: v0.10.0
body:
App3:
* boosting speedup via adaptive feature scan and minibatch life span
* allow users to set random seed in gradient boosting training
* fix a bug in unordered span near query for ngrams with duplicate words
* add an option to filter out ngrams with duplicate words
* allow users to specify whether the ngram matching is in order or out of order
* fix a bug that causes the slowness in categorical feature matching
* add an option to skip rare labels
* add an option to sort docs in report by confidence or mistake
* introduce a validation set for early stopping and probability calibration
* better probability calibration for individual label probabilities

GB regressor:
* add logger
* allow users to set report folder name
* add an option to skip PMML

Special thanks to Jinpeng Wang for helping with the span near query fix.

name: v0.9.4
body: App3: reduce isotonic regression calibration memory usage

name: v0.9.3
body: App3: improved isotonic regression based calibration

name: v0.9.2
body:
App3:
* output calibrated probabilities generated by isotonic regression
* dump all the rules in the model

name: v0.9.1
body:
App3:
* Fix several Elasticsearch 5 compatibility issues
* Resolve the conflict between warm-start and early stopping
* Make macro F tuning more robust to rare labels

name: v0.9.0
body:
App3: 
* compatible with Elasticsearch 5
* fix ngram frequency calculation bug
* fast stochastic boosting training
* built-in Java visualizer

Special thanks to Bishwajeet Dey for help with Elasticsearch 5 upgrade
Special thanks to Jinpeng Wang for writing the phrase count query module
Special thanks to Shikhar Prasoon for writing the Java visualizer

name: v0.8.5
body: Provide support for saving gradient boosting models in PMML format

name: v0.8.4
body: App3: change minDf to be a relative threshold

name: v0.8.3
body:
Fix the matrix density issue in App3
Fix the categorical feature printing issue in App3

name: v0.8.2
body: release [CBM with gradient boosting learners](https://github.com/cheng-li/pyramid/wiki/CBM#cbm-with-gradient-boosting-base-learners)

name: v0.8.1
body:
release [Bernoulli mixtures for label clustering](https://github.com/cheng-li/pyramid/wiki/Bernoulli-Mixtures)
release [CBM with elastic-net regularized logistic regression learners](https://github.com/cheng-li/pyramid/wiki/CBM)

name: v0.8.0
body:
CBM:
* speed up training and prediction
* support more prediction methods designed for different metrics
* support hyper parameter tuning and early stopping

See https://github.com/cheng-li/pyramid/wiki/CBM for more details.

name: v0.7.16
body: Fix the broken visualizer

name: v0.7.15
body:
App3: 
* Add ngram selection
* Fix prior probability bug
We thank Jeff Woodward for reporting the bug in prior probability.

name: v0.7.14
body: Redesign App3 properties to allow users to omit certain parameters at prediction time

name: v0.7.13
body: App3: ensure properties consistency during training and prediction

name: v0.7.12
body:
App3:
- Improved logging
- New options for skipping Json outputs

name: v0.7.11
body:
App3: write large csv files in a better way.

We thank Jeff Woodward for reporting the issue with csv files.

name: v0.7.10
body:
App3:
- Terminate training when there is no significant performance improvement
- Parallelize macro F tuning

name: v0.7.9
body:
App3:
- support early stopping during training
- remove the option of splitting train/test by field values

name: v0.7.8
body:
App3: optimize ElasticSearch Queries to reduce network traffic.

We thank Jeff Woodward for reporting the network traffic issue.

name: v0.7.7
body: output probabilities produced by CBM

name: v0.7.6
body:
Fix a bug in App3: close elasticsearch connections when exceptions happen.

We thank Jeff Woodward for reporting this bug.

name: v0.7.5
body:
Fix a leaking file descriptors bug.

We thank Jeff Woodward for reporting this bug.

name: v0.7.4
body:
Fix a numerical stability issue that causes CBM+LR to crash.

We thank jagdeeppani for reporting this issue.

name: v0.7.3
body:
CRF: 
- fix a bug in loss evaluation
- show test performance during training

name: v0.7.2
body:
- Write CBM and CRF predictions to files
- App3 supports code description features

name: v0.7.1
body: Fix a bug that causes CBM with GB learner to crash

name: v0.7.0
body:
Release two algorithms:
- Gradient Boosting for classification (see https://github.com/cheng-li/pyramid/wiki/GB-Classifier)
- Gradient Boosting for regression (see https://github.com/cheng-li/pyramid/wiki/GB-Regressor)

Breaking change:
The command line application of Pyramid now takes one argument instead of two (see https://github.com/cheng-li/pyramid/wiki#command-line-usage)

name: v0.6.2
body:
App3: 
- significantly reduce memory usage during training and prediction
- speed up metrics computation

name: v0.6.1
body: App3 supports ngram filtering by regular expressions

name: v0.6.0
body: add pairwise CRF

name: v0.5.5
body:
- fix a bug in elasticnet
- App3 supports empty field in elasticsearch
- App3 supports user specified ngram list and keyword filtering

name: v0.5.4
body:
- better display of label probabilities in reports
- App3 supports empty labels

name: v0.5.3
body: App3 supports field length normalized term frequency.

name: v0.5.2
body:
Small improvements:
- add option train.generateReports in App3
- improve the report generation speed

name: v0.5.1
body:
Bug fix: delete the unrecognized characters which prevent the code from compiling on Windows
We thank Jeff Woodward for reporting this issue.

name: v0.5.0
body:
This is the first public release of Pyramid.
- add Conditional Bernoulli Mixture (CBM)
- add various plugin predictors for IMLGB

name: v0.4.0
body:
- New functions in App3: split by queries; skip distribution generation; custom folder name; label filter
- Add App4: Elasticnet (L1+L2) regularized linear regression
- Better AppLauncher
- More multi-label measures: instance, micro and macro

name: v0.3.1
body: Fix the bug which makes visualizer work improperly with independent prediction mode

name: v0.3.0
body:
- Add individual_performance.json to App2 and visualizer
- Deal with empty multi-label set when loading and writing data
- Better support for missing value
- Fix bugs in measures
- Weighted Boosting, Regression Tree, Logistic Regression

name: v0.2.2
body: visualizer bug fix

name: v0.2.1
body: fix visualizer label set ranking bug

name: v0.1.0
body: initial release
